channel.title: To everyone who is having trouble port forwarding!
channel.description:
Ok i think i have your solution!
Im not positive but it may work.
You need to reboot your router so the information can refresh.
1.unplug your modem{power} 2.unplug router(power) 3.Wait 20 seconds 4.Plug it back in 5. See if it works
Please reply tell me if it works or not
